inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed diagnosis of solid tumor
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Papillary thyroid cancer dx w/ right neck mass

exclusion.criterion: Inability to fill out the EORTC QLQ-C30 questionnaire.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Absence of a certain diagnosis of solid tumor (e.g. subjects on screening programs)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and has undergone various treatments, including XRT and RAI ablation.
